programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Robin tries to hold the crew together while unraveling the mystery of the missing memories. Meanwhile, Nami and Zoro flashback to painful moments from their pasts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mysterious boy with a horn and robin's deduction!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally discover the culprit behind their memory loss, but they’ve got bigger problems. The mysterious thief is determined to pit Zoro and Luffy against each other!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Now, let's get back our memories! The pirate crew lands on the island!

programme.title: Zoro and Luffy fight to the death, Nami attempts to orchestrate an uprising, and Sanji discovers he’s willing to kick a kid in order to get his memories back!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro bares his fangs! A savage animal stands in the way!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally regain their memories, but a much larger challenge looms on the horizon. The mysterious thief is about to transform into something even more powerful!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The last counterattack by the memory thief who reveals his true colors!

programme.title: A terrible storm leads to another run in with the devious Captain Foxy! When Luffy makes the dangerous decision to help his old foe, it could spell disaster for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and his mates must survive another outrageous battle aboard Captain Foxy’s booby-trapped boat, and even if they survive, something far worse awaits them!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The guy who's the closest to invincible? And the most dangerous man!

programme.title: The Straw Hats take time out to help a group of hungry castaways, but trouble looms on the horizon. An icy marine adversary is out to track down Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Navy headquarters admiral aokiji! The ferocity of an ultimate powerhouse!

programme.title: Chopper and Usopp work feverishly to save Robin from her icy tomb, and Luffy looks to settle the score with Admiral Aokiji in a man-to-man fight to the finish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Duel between rubber and ice! Luffy vs. Aokiji!

programme.title: An encounter with a giant swimming frog leads to a close call with a seafaring train! Next up for the Straw Hats: drop anchor at a town full of water and seek out a shipwright!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The dashing sea train and the city of water, water seven!

programme.title: Luffy, Usopp, and Nami take a wild ride through Water Seven in search of a shipwright. Meanwhile, Chopper and Robin get separated during their quest to find a bookstore!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Adventure in the city on the water! Head to the mammoth shipbuilding plant!

programme.title: Zoro is attacked by thugs who want to cash in on his bounty, Sanji gets lost on a grocery shopping expedition, and three suitcases full of cash mysteriously go missing!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A carpenter and his talking pigeon help recover the Straw Hats’ missing money, but the Franky Family won’t give up so easily. Luffy and Nami receive very bad news about their beloved boat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Galley-la company! A grand sight: dock #1!

programme.title: Luffy and Nami refuse to believe that the Going Merry’s seaworthy days are finished, but for now, bigger problems loom on the horizon! Their money is missing again, along with Usopp!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pirate abduction incident! A pirate ship that can only await her end!

programme.title: Usopp bravely tries to recover the stolen money, but the Franky Family has him badly outnumbered. Zoro, Sanji, and Chopper set out on a rescue mission, but they’ll need Luffy to even the odds!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rescuing our friend! Raid on the franky house!

programme.title: Usopp regains consciousness after his vicious beating, but he’s not at all happy to hear Luffy’s plans for the Going Merry. Temper flares and challenges are issued as the Straw Hats face their most uncertain hour.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big fight under the moon! The pirate flag flutters with sorrow!

programme.title: Luffy and Usopp battle to a brutal standstill in a heartbreaking duel between men who once called each other family. Can the Straw Hats find the strength to carry on without their sniper?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy vs. Usopp! Collision of two men's pride!

programme.title: The Straw Hat split is overshadowed by an assassination attempt on the mayor of Water Seven! Luffy is eager to investigate, but the leader of the Franky Family is about to reappear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Severe shock hits the city of water! Iceberg targeted!

programme.title: Luffy’s grudge match with Franky gets serious when his opponent turns out to be a cyborg! Iceberg awakes from his slumber only to hurl heinous accusations at the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy is branded an assassin and attacked by Iceberg’s strongest men! Meanwhile, Sanji and Chopper attempt to warn Usopp about an impending natural disaster!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates are the culprits? The protectors of the city of water!

programme.title: The citizens of Water Seven search for the Straw Hats and a devastating storm threatens to sink the city. Chopper and Sanji pick up Robin’s trail, but they aren’t prepared for what they’ll find.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eternal farewell? Nico robin: the woman who draws darkness!

programme.title: Usopp prepares to ride out the storm aboard the Going Merry, Franky hatches a plan to force Luffy into a rematch, and the Straw Hats set out to uncover Robin’s dark secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capture robin! The determination of the straw hats!

programme.title: Robin and her CP9 brethren seek to settle unfinished business with Iceberg. The Straw Hats have a plan to clear their names, but the assassins are one step ahead of them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cannon fire is the signal! Cp9 goes into action!

programme.title: Luffy makes his long-awaited entrance, Iceberg has a shocking surprise in store for Robin, and the true identities of the masked assassins of CP9 are finally revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cp9 takes off their masks! Their shocking true faces!

programme.title: CP9 listens to Iceberg’s blood to learn the location of the blueprints, Usopp has another run-in with Franky and the remaining Straw Hats – plus a new friend – race to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the gang come face to face with Robin and her CP9 comrades. The rubberman is prepared to fight for his friend, but he’s never faced foes like this!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Come back, Robin! Showdown with cp9!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami are sent hurtling toward their deaths by the villains of CP9! Meanwhile, Usopp forges an unlikely friendship with Franky while waiting out a storm.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates annihilated? The menace of the leopard model!

programme.title: Franky tries to convince Usopp that there’s no hope for the Going Merry, but the sniper – inspired by a mysterious moment from the past – remains loyal to his beloved boat
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The man who is loved even by his ship! Usopp's tears!

programme.title: A look back at Franky’s past reveals the amazing origins of the sea train – and paints a vivid picture of his younger days, spent alongside Iceberg and the legendary shipwright Tom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Franky's past! The day the sea train first ran!

programme.title: Franky’s backstory continues! The sea train is a success, and it looks like Tom’s life is spared! Unfortunately, a government spy is searching for a reason to investigate Tom, and Franky provides the ammunition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spandam's scheme! The day the sea train shook!

programme.title: Tom does the unthinkable in an attempt to protect his apprentices, but young Franky is unable to control his rage, leading to a showdown with a spy – and a train!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The end of the legendary man! The day the sea train cried!

programme.title: Chopper’s heroism may mean the difference between life and death for Iceberg and Paulie, Nami learns the agonizing truth about Robin, and Sanji prepares to make his move!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The truth behind her betrayal! Robin's sorrowful decision!

programme.title: Nami makes a frantic dash for the Sea Train station, Chopper searches desperately for Zoro and Luffy, and Sanji plays it cool while waiting for the right time to spring into action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The steam whistle forces friends apart! The sea train starts to run

programme.title: Nami arrives at the train station a minute too late, Sanji makes his presence aboard the sea train known, and the search for Luffy and Zoro continues!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji barges in! Sea train battle in the storm!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: An enhanced super soldier teams up with battle-hardened Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton) and an unexpected ally (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to stop the deadliest Terminator yet. Humanity's fate hangs in the balance in this action-packed thrill ride.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: An enhanced super soldier teams up with battle-hardened Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton) and an unexpected ally (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to stop the deadliest Terminator yet. Humanity's fate hangs in the balance in this action-packed thrill ride.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: Warlock, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: An ex-outlaw (Richard Widmark) divides and challenges a quick-draw lawman (Henry Fonda) and his sidekick (Anthony Quinn).

programme.title: The Gambler Returns (Part 1), (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The Gambler Brady Hawkes is back and he's about to lose his primary means of livelihood, when a law banning gambling is about to be passed.

programme.title: The Gambler Returns (Part 2), (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The Gambler Brady Hawkes is back and he's about to lose his primary means of livelihood, when a law banning gambling is about to be passed.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: High Noon, (1951, Drama)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper won the Oscar for the Best Actor in this classic tale of a lawman who stands alone to defend a town of cowardly citizens against a gang of revenge-seeking criminals.

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Hollow Man, (2000, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon and Elisabeth Shue play former lovers who, along with a team of other scientists like themselves, discover the secret of invisibility. Rating: R

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: Tears of the Sun, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: After a West African president's family is assassinated and civil unrest is rampant, a top-secret team is deployed to the far reaches of the jungle to rescue a U.S. doctor who is acting as a missionary.

programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A new arrival at the Hilltop opens up about the leader of a group of mask-wearing savages; a search party sets out on a daring mission to find two missing friends.

programme.title: The savage group led by Alpha confronts the Hilltop in a harrowing attempt to retrieve her daughter; a supply run for the Kingdom turns into a dangerous quest.

programme.title: While one community struggles to ease tensions that threaten to divide from within, the true nature of another group comes into focus; a mission to rescue a friend has deadly consequences.

programme.title: Daryl's daring rescue mission forces Alpha to unleash a group of her own to retrieve what belongs to her, even if the price is paid in blood; the Kingdom's plans to reunite the communities are put in jeopardy.

programme.title: An outsider's arrival forces Alexandria to rehash devastating old wounds; eye-opening secrets from the past are revealed.

programme.title: In the aftermath of an overwhelming loss, the communities must brave a ferocious blizzard; as one group deals with an enemy from within, another is forced to make a life or death decision.

programme.title: The group in Oceanside continues to train in case the Whisperers return; tensions are high as the heroes struggle to hold onto their concept of civilization.

programme.title: The threat of the Whisperers return leads to paranoia sweeping over Alexandria; in the meantime, Carol battles with the need for revenge.

programme.title: Still-paranoid Alexandrians get riled up over the Whisperers and take their fear out on Negan; at Hilltop, the group deals with an unexpected safety issue.

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruéis vikings vai à Grã-Bretanha com a intenção de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa náufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se até chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operação Zodíaco

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive é contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.

programme.title: Encontrando o Amor em Nebraska
programme.desc: Kennedy Blaine, uma garota californiana, herda um rancho na pequena cidade de Valentine, em Nebraska. Antes de vender a propriedade, ela decide passar o verão no rancho e aprender mais sobre sua família.

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança
programme.desc: Esta é a história de Angélica, uma garota de 16 anos que está lutando contra um tipo raro de câncer chamado Síndrome Mielodisplásica, sua luta para tentar viver uma vida normal e sua esperança de encontrar seu primeiro amor antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A História de Wim de A a Z) Esta é a história do órfão Wim, que quer muito ir à escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma família amorosa.

programme.title: Eu Amo Shakey
programme.desc: Um pai carinhoso se muda com sua filha para um apartamento em um edifício chique, livres de aluguel, mas há um problema: É PROIBIDO CÃES! Isso significa que eles terão que esconder seu adorável filhote, Shakey, mas isso não é tão fácil quanto parece. Shakey tem o hábito de escapar e acaba sendo pego pelo síndico desastrado. Ameaçados de despejo, o que eles farão para continuar com o Shakey?

programme.title: Turma da Luta
programme.desc: Crianças de um bairro pobre enfrentam a invicta equipe Beverly Hills Junior National Karate.

programme.title: Encontrando o Amor em Nebraska
programme.desc: Kennedy Blaine, uma garota californiana, herda um rancho na pequena cidade de Valentine, em Nebraska. Antes de vender a propriedade, ela decide passar o verão no rancho e aprender mais sobre sua família.

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança
programme.desc: Esta é a história de Angélica, uma garota de 16 anos que está lutando contra um tipo raro de câncer chamado Síndrome Mielodisplásica, sua luta para tentar viver uma vida normal e sua esperança de encontrar seu primeiro amor antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: O Garoto de Ouro
programme.desc: Quando Mats encontra um par de calças que contém uma quantidade ilimitada de dinheiro no bolso a vida

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Moises
programme.desc: O rei do Egito é avisado da profecia de que Messias chegará. Para evitar que o inimigo sobreviva, ele ordena que matem todos os bebês do sexo masculino.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Samuel, o Menino Profeta
programme.desc: Havia em Israel uma mulher estéril chamada Ana, cujo maior desejo era ter um filho. Um dia, ao ir ao templo, ela pediu ao Senhor que lhe desse um bebê, e o prometeu que ao nascer, o entregaria para viver no templo, servindo por toda a vida ao Senhor.

programme.title: A Colônia
programme.desc: Na nova era glacial, um grupo de sobreviventes luta para proteger a humanidade de uma ameaça muito mais selvagem do que a natureza.

programme.title: Acima de Qualquer Suspeita
programme.desc: C.J. Nichols (Jesse Metcalfe) é um jornalista investigativo disposto a denunciar o famoso promotor Mark Hunter (Michael Douglas), franco candidato a governador, por manipular provas em seus processos. Para isso, decide expor os perigos da evidência circunstancial, que pode levar um inocente a ser condenado, vai preso por um assassinato que não cometeu, mas seu plano começa a dar errado e a sua prisão pode ser definitiva.

programme.title: A Maldição do Castelo Margam
programme.desc: Uma equipe de parapsicólogos americanos viaja ao País de Gales para realizar um estudo no Castelo de Margam, um dos edifícios mais assombrados do Reino Unido.

programme.title: Mortos Vivos
programme.desc: Um xerife deve resgatar uma família afastada de uma montanha durante uma erupção vulcânica

programme.title: Uma História de Amor e Fúria
programme.desc: Gira em torno do amor entre um herói imortal e Janaína, a mulher por quem ele está apaixonado há 600 anos, através da colonização, escravidão, domínio militar e o futuro do Brasil em 2096, em meio às guerras da água.

programme.title: Aprisionados
programme.desc: Realizado em uma delegacia de polícia remota, um estranho misterioso toma conta das mentes e das almas de todos dentro.

programme.title: Baile de Formatura
programme.desc: Enquanto um grupo de adolescentes se prepara para o baile de formatura, eles não sabem que um assassino está em busca de vingança. Uma noite de celebração rapidamente se transforma em um terrível banho de sangue... e todos são suspeitos.

programme.title: A Colônia
programme.desc: Na nova era glacial, um grupo de sobreviventes luta para proteger a humanidade de uma ameaça muito mais selvagem do que a natureza.

programme.title: Sequestro Relâmpago
programme.desc: Lorraine, uma mãe solteira desamparada e seu filho de 8 anos, são sequestrados por Roy, um violento ladrão de bancos, que a obriga a dirigir através do país para encontrar o cúmplice que está com o dinheiro do roubo. A luta de Lorraine pela sobrevivência marca o início de sua jornada rumo à liberdade.

programme.title: Laços de um Crime
programme.desc: Quando a polícia descobre uma jovem brutalmente assassinada, os irmãos Joe Fairburn (Paul Bettany) e Chrissie Fairburn se juntam ao seu supervisor, Robert (Mark Strong), para investigar o principal suspeito: Jason Buliegh, um criminoso sexual. Forçados a liberar Jason da custódia da polícia, os Fairburns tomam o assunto em suas próprias mãos; sufocados pela sombra de seu pai.

programme.title: Inimigo Em Casa
programme.desc: Quando Danny testemunha o assassinato de um homem por seu padrasto Rick, o pai de Danny, Frank, precisa proteger seu filho do maior perigo.

programme.title: Vincent N Roxxy
programme.desc: Vincent (Emile Hirsch) é um solitário em uma pequena cidade e Roxxy (Zoë Kravitz) uma rebelde roqueira. Quando ambos correm perigo por se envolverem, em diferentes circunstâncias, com um temido criminoso, eles se apaixonam, descobrindo que a violência os seguirá para qualquer lugar.

programme.title: Jogo de Xadrez
programme.desc: Mina foi parar atrás das grades após um crime de corrupção. Mas o mandante, o senador Franco, usa sua influência para mantê-la presa e abafar o caso.

programme.title: Federal
programme.desc: O Delegado Vital e o agente Dani estão à frente de uma operação do Comando de Operações Táticas da Polícia Federal do Brasil para capturar o playboy brasiliense Carlos Beque, envolvido com o tráfico internacional de cocaína.

programme.title: Segurança Nacional
programme.desc: O governo brasileiro lidera os países latino-americanos na luta contra os cartéis de drogas. Em resposta, os cartéis de drogas iniciam uma série de ataques contra as cidades e os recursos naturais do Brasil.

programme.title: Sequestro Relâmpago

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro
programme.desc: Na década de 60, Chester e Colette são um casal que decide fazer turismo na Grécia. Eles conhecem Rydal, um americano que os ajuda nos passeios, mas que também é um vigarista. Porém, o guia trapaceiro descobre que os dois não são pessoas inocentes e uma estranha parceria acaba se formando.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: Um motorista luta para pagar uma dívida. Ele assume um trabalho com um passageiro louco e perigoso.

programme.title: Mundo adulto
programme.desc: Amy acredita estar destinada a ser poeta e busca orientação com um escritor solitário.

programme.title: Albatroz
programme.desc: Beth, uma adolescente estudiosa, fica amiga de Emilia, uma aspirante a romancista recém-chegada à cidade. Emilia logo começa a ter um caso com o pai de Beth e isso pode ser a porta de entrada para consequências devastadoras.

programme.title: O Mau Exemplo de Cameron Post
programme.desc: Flagrada pelo namorado transando com a melhor amiga em pleno baile de formatura, Cameron Post (Chloe Grace Moretz) é enviada pela tia para um centro religioso que afirma curar jovens atraídos pelo mesmo sexo, mas para se submeter ou não ao suposto tratamento, a adolescente precisa antes descobrir quem é de fato.

programme.title: Diário De Um Jornalista Bêbado
programme.desc: O jornalista americano Paul Kemp consegue um trabalho em Porto Rico durante a década de 1960.

programme.title: S.O.S. do Amor
programme.desc: Em um cruzeiro ao Caribe, Jenny está abandonada em uma praia com seu ídolo do rock and roll.

programme.title: Terapia do Amor
programme.desc: Rafi, uma bela produtora de fotos de 37 anos se recuperando de um divórcio recente, conhece David, um belo pintor de 23 anos recém-saído da faculdade.

programme.title: O Último Vice-Rei
programme.desc: Em 1947, Lord Mountbatten assume o cargo de último vice-rei, encarregado de entregar a Índia de volta ao seu povo. Ele massa a viver no andar de cima na casa que era antes de governantes britânicos, enquanto 500 criados hindus, muçulmanos e sikh viviam no andar de baixo.

programme.title: Não Estou Lá - As Muitas Vidas de Bob Dylan
programme.desc: Seis personagens (um ator, um cantor folk, um trovador eletrificado, o poeta francês Arthur Rimbaud, o fora-da-lei Billy the Kid e o cantor americano Woody Guthrie) encarnam as diferentes personalidades da lenda da música Bob Dylan.

programme.title: O Livro do Amor
programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa grávida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: Um serviço que oferece recriações holográficas de entes queridos falecidos permite que uma mulher fique cara a cara com a versão mais jovem de seu falecido marido.

programme.title: Entre Dois Mundos
programme.desc: Ryan é um jovem escritor dividido entre o amor, seu sonho e seus segredos.

programme.title: Entre o Amor e a Fama
programme.desc: Uma estrela de reality show deixa Hollywood e se reencontra em uma comunidade Amish, em Nebraska, onde deve decidir entre permanecer em sua nova realidade ou retornar à antiga.

programme.title: O Último Vice-Rei
programme.desc: Em 1947, Lord Mountbatten assume o cargo de último vice-rei, encarregado de entregar a Índia de volta ao seu povo. Ele massa a viver no andar de cima na casa que era antes de governantes britânicos, enquanto 500 criados hindus, muçulmanos e sikh viviam no andar de baixo.
